author: hatakeyamak
body:
#### PR description:

See: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37219

The PFRecHitQTestHCALThresholdVsDepth test is used for HBHE and HF PFRecHits. It can accept a parameter set vector for threshold cuts, one for each subdetector, but only one set can be saved at a time. This PR extends this class to accommodate parameter sets for multiple detector enums.

#### PR validation:

I haven't done anything specifically for this branch, but https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37219 was merged successfully.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

See discussion on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37219
The backport was sugggested, so that it will be picked up for Run 3 startup HLT.

@laurenhay @marksan87 @juska @kdlong @silviodonato @missirol
title: Backport: Bug fix for multiple detectors in PFRecHitQTestHCALThresholdVsDepth test
